By degrees<lb n="c57-0002__main__12"/>I remembera stronger light pressed upon <lb n="c57-0002__main__13"/>my nerves <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0002__main__d4e94">and</del>so that I was obliged to close<lb n="c57-0002__main__14"/>my eyes. Darkness then came over me<lb n="c57-0002__main__15"/>and troubled me.–But hardly had I felt <lb n="c57-0002__main__16"/>this when (byopening my eyesas I now suppose)<lb n="c57-0002__main__17"/>the light poured in upon me again–I walked <lb n="c57-0002__main__18"/>andI believedescended; but presently Ifound <lb n="c57-0002__main__19"/>a great <mod sID="c57-0002__main__d4e110"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0002__main__d4e112">difference</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0002__main__d4e115"/>alteration<sga-add eID="c57-0002__main__d4e115"/><mod eID="c57-0002__main__d4e110"/>in my sensations; before<lb n="c57-0002__main__20"/>dark opaque bodies had surrounded me<sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0002__main__d4e121"/>, <sga-add eID="c57-0002__main__d4e121"/><lb n="c57-0002__main__21"/>impervious to my touch or sight – andI <lb n="c57-0002__main__22"/>now found that I could wander on at liberty<lb n="c57-0002__main__23"/>with no obstacles which I could not either <lb n="c57-0002__main__24"/>surmount or avoid–The light <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0002__main__d4e133">be</del> became <mod sID="c57-0002__main__d4e136"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0002__main__d4e138"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0002__main__d4e138"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0002__main__d4e144"/>more <sga-add eID="c57-0002__main__d4e144"/><mod eID="c57-0002__main__d4e136"/>&<lb n="c57-0002__main__25"/> more opressiveto me andthe heat wearying <lb n="c57-0002__main__26"/>me as I walkedI sought a place where I could <lb n="c57-0002__main__27"/> <milestone spanTo="#c57-0002.04" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c57-0002.02"/> perceive <anchor xml:id="c57-0002.04"/> <milestone spanTo="#c57-0002.05" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c57-0002.03"/> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0002__main__d4e162"/>recieve <sga-add eID="c57-0002__main__d4e162"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0002.05"/>shade. This was the forest near Ingolstadt,<lb n="c57-0002__main__28"/>andhere by the side of a brook I lay <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0002__main__d4e171">weary</del> <lb n="c57-0002__main__29"/>for some hours <mod sID="c57-0002__main__d4e177"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0002__main__d4e179"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0002__main__d4e179"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0002__main__d4e185"/>resting from my fatigue <sga-add eID="c57-0002__main__d4e185"/><mod eID="c57-0002__main__d4e177"/> untillI felt tormented by <lb n="c57-0002__main__30"/>hunger and thirst. This roused me from my nearly <lb n="c57-0003__main__1"/>dormant stateand I ate some berries <lb n="c57-0003__main__2"/>which I found <mod sID="c57-0003__main__d4e203"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e205"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e205"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e211"/>hanging<sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e211"/><mod eID="c57-0003__main__d4e203"/>on the treesor lying on <lb n="c57-0003__main__3"/>the ground –I slaked my thirst bythe <lb n="c57-0003__main__4"/>brookand then again lying down Iwas <lb n="c57-0003__main__5"/>overcome by sleep <mod sID="c57-0003__main__d4e222"/> <mdel>–</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e226"/>; <sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e226"/><mod eID="c57-0003__main__d4e222"/> Itwas dark when I <lb n="c57-0003__main__6"/>awoke,I felt cold alsoand half frightened <lb n="c57-0003__main__7"/><mod sID="c57-0003__main__d4e234"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e236"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark><sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e236"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e242"/>as it were instinctively <sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e242"/><mod eID="c57-0003__main__d4e234"/> on <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e246">seein</del>finding myself so desolate. <lb n="c57-0003__main__8"/>Before I had quitted you<sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e252"/>r <sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e252"/> appartment<lb n="c57-0003__main__9"/>on a sensation of coldI had covered my<lb n="c57-0003__main__10"/>selfwith some clothes,but these were <lb n="c57-0003__main__11"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e261">not</del> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e265"/>in <sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e265"/>sufficientto secure me from the <lb n="c57-0003__main__12"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e270">dw</del> dews of night. I was a poor helpless<lb n="c57-0003__main__13"/>miserable wretch—I knew <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e275">no</del>& could <lb n="c57-0003__main__14"/>distinguish <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e281">no</del> nothing but <mod sID="c57-0003__main__d4e284"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e286">felt</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e289"/> <metamark>^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e289"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0003__main__d4e294"/>feeling<sga-add eID="c57-0003__main__d4e294"/><mod eID="c57-0003__main__d4e284"/>pain <lb n="c57-0003__main__15"/>invade me on all sides <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e300">and</del>I sat down <lb n="c57-0003__main__16"/>and wept. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0003__main__17"/>Soona gentle light stole over the <lb n="c57-0003__main__18"/>heavensand gave me a sensation of pleasure<lb n="c57-0003__main__19"/>I started up, and beheld a radiant form <lb n="c57-0003__main__20"/>rise <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e316">am</del> from among the trees.I gazed with <lb n="c57-0003__main__21"/>a kind of wonder –It moved slowly;but <lb n="c57-0003__main__22"/>it enlightened my path,and I again <lb n="c57-0003__main__23"/>went out in search of berries. I was still <lb n="c57-0003__main__24"/>coldwhen <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e328">on the ground</del> under one of the <lb n="c57-0003__main__25"/>trees I found a huge cloakwith which I–<lb n="c57-0003__main__26"/>covered myself, and sat down onthe ground. <lb n="c57-0003__main__27"/>No distinct ideas occupied my mindall was <lb n="c57-0003__main__28"/>confused <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0003__main__d4e340">and</del>I felt the light, and hunger<lb n="c57-0003__main__29"/>and thirstand darkness; innumerable <lb n="c57-0003__main__30"/>sounds rung in my earsand on all sides <lb n="c57-0003__main__31"/>various scents saluted me;the only object <lb n="c57-0003__main__32"/>that I could distinguish was the bright<lb n="c57-0004__main__1"/> moonand <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0004__main__d4e363"/>I <sga-add eID="c57-0004__main__d4e363"/>fixed my eyes <mod sID="c57-0004__main__d4e366"/> <mdel>i</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0004__main__d4e370"/>o <sga-add eID="c57-0004__main__d4e370"/><mod eID="c57-0004__main__d4e366"/> n <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0004__main__d4e374">th</del>that with <lb n="c57-0004__main__2"/>pleasure.
